revision.text: Possibly: Flora Scotica: or, a systematic arrangement, in the Linnaean method, of the native plants of Scotland and the Hebrides. By John Lightfoot, A.M. Rector of Gotham in Nottinghamshire, and Chaplain to the Duchess Dowager of Portland. 2v. (London : Printed for B White, at Horace's Head in Fleet-Street, M.DCC.LXXVII. [1777]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2500601~S1
